post.html: SRE sounds like a plan with no drawbacks … but making it work in practice can be trickier than the theory says. This talk shares stories of SRE wins and SRE accidents.

authornote.html: Holly Cummins. Holly Cummins is a Senior Principal Software Engineer at Red Hat, in the Quarkus Team. She is a keynote speaker, author, and bad illustrator.
